snippet.title: Button Soccer - Offical Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Button Soccer is a multi-platform mobile game that brings back the magic of childhood to many people. Developed and inspired by the classic and late Brazilian Button Soccer game, Button Soccer has had over 1 million downloads on several platforms. 

Fun and dynamic, this classical game can be played against other challengers, or even against the artificial intelligence of the game.
